QuestData.Title: Dark Iron Down
QuestData.Description: While you were away our rangari here found more clues leadin' to some of me other friends.$b$bBurrian Coalpart and Scorchbrow.$b$bProblem is, their trail heads right for Evermorn Springs to the west.$b$bPlease Commander, will ya get in there and save them from mulching?
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Burrian Coalpart in Evermorn Springs.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Find Burrian Coalpart in Evermorn Springs.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah! It was terrible! They made me eat an' eat an' eat.$b$bDon' get me wrong, I enjoy a good meal but these plant people had me eatin' nuthin' but fruit.$b$bI canno' take it anymore.
